definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Objective To explore the inhibitory mechanism of Imatinib mesylate on pulmonary fibrosis induced by bleomycin in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨格列卫对小鼠肺纤维化的干预机制。

sentences.english: Moreover, subjects' perceptions on safe sex and self-protection from sex risk behavior in the intervention group were improved.
sentences.chinese: 此外，干预组对象的安全性行为和自我保护意识增强。

sentences.english: If the country does encounter some shakiness, look for the government to intervene.
sentences.chinese: 如果中国遇到了波动的话，就寻求政府的干预吧。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of early intervention on high-risk infants'cognitive development.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨早期干预对高危儿认知发育的影响。

sentences.english: "Rent-seeking" is a kind of economic phenomenon produced by government's interference .
sentences.chinese: “寻租”是政府干预产生的一类经济现象。

sentences.english: The Effect of Nursing Intervention on Improvement of Anxiety and Depression in DM Patients;
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨酚妥拉明治疗产后尿潴留的护理干预效果。

sentences.english: Objective To promote the intervention for preventing the mother-to-infant transmission of HIV among HIV infected pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 目的促进艾滋病感染孕产妇母婴阻断干预措施的实施。

sentences.english: The question then is how many dislocations one allows before treating the patient surgically?
sentences.chinese: 那么问题是，究竟多少次脱位才考虑外科手术干预呢？
他们正在干预患者什么呢？

sentences.english: His interference spilt over into confusion.
At last the litigants could easily interfere in cases, which hurts the fairness of justice.
sentences.chinese: 三是案件易受当事人不正当干预，影响司法公正。

sentences.english: Objective To explore integrated mode of community smoking control in Hefei.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索合肥市城市社区控烟综合干预模式。

sentences.english: Results There were not patients have aucte bed sore after using the pre-warning intervention.
sentences.chinese: 结果实施压疮预警干预程序后，无一例压疮发生。

sentences.english: The government intervenes wherever the economy would be vulnerable if left to itself.
sentences.chinese: 凡经济任其自流就会出问题的场合，政府就要干预。

sentences.english: Some donors and health communities have embraced micronutrient interventions.
sentences.chinese: 一些捐助者和卫生界已经接纳了微量营养物质干预。

sentences.english: QOL should be used as the ultimate goal to evaluate treatment interventions.
sentences.chinese: 临床实践和干预措施应以提高生活质量为目标。

definition: to let sb do whatever they want/to indulge/to give free reins to/to let things slide/to drift aimlessly/laissez-faire
to check and balance (power)/checks and balances
to take action/to adopt policies/to move on some issue
